award_title: Algebraic Number Fields in Fourier Analysis and Fractal Geometry
subject: Tools that outlive their papers
body:
Hi Robert,

Your work on how functions decompose at different scales sounds like it generates some real computational powerâ€”the kind of thing students build and then it lives in a drawer.

That's what we're trying to fix with Ouro. It turns your lab's code, data pipelines, and analysis into shareable blocks other researchers can actually use. When someone pulls your students' tools into their own work, your lab's lineage travels with them.

Would be curious what you think. No pressure at all.

Hope you're having a good holiday.

Best,
Matt

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
